problem_text: In \triangle P Q R, S T \parallel R Q. If P T = 7.5, T Q = 3, and S R = 2.5, find P S.
compact_text: In \triangle PQR, ST \parallel RQ. If PT = 7.5, TQ = 3, and SR = 2.5, find PS.
annotat_text: In $\triangle PQR$, $\overline{ST} \| \overline{R Q}$ . If  $PT=7.5$, $TQ=3$, and $SR=2.5$, find $PS$.
